tool_description: The Option Chain Data API is developed by Inter Data Limited to provide real-time Options prices and Stock data for United States listed options. The data is provided in easy to consume JSON format through RESTful API. The data covers all expiration dates of a listed options.
name: Options Chain
title: Options Chain

api_list.name: options
api_list.description: Return real-time options data for the given ticker
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://options-chain.p.rapidapi.com/options/aapl"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "options-chain.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://options-chain.p.rapidapi.com/options/{ticker}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "options-chain.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: straddle
